numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In most sports, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
2. I wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color.
3. I ask whether this relates to their major.
4. I ask whether this relates to their background.
6. Sports try to include more people of color.
7. The inclusion of more people of color is important.
8. The diversity of players and coaches in sports team leadership is important.
